    • Constructor Detail

      • WMS

        public WMS(java.lang.String sURL,
   WMSVersionEnum eWMSVersion,
   java.lang.String sTileFormat,
   boolean bTransparent,
   java.util.List<java.lang.String> oLayers)
    throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        This constructor creates a WMS
        Parameters:
        sURL - This parameter set the url for the service.
        eWMSVersion - This parameter set the WMS version for the service.
        sTileFormat - This parameter sets the format of the tiles requested.
        bTransparent - this parameter set the transparency property.
        oLayers - This is a list of layers that must be displayed.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the url string is invalid.

        public void setLayers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> newLayers)
               throws EMP_Exception

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
